text: Nan adarasi, ia oragh. Nguazimɨn itir gumazibar damazibar itir gumazir onganaraziba, gumazir kaba God me amɨsevegha ghaze, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn arazimɨn iti. A fomɨra gumazamizir bar a gifongeziba bagha akam akɨra ghaze, a bar me gativagh men ganam. Kamaghɨn a gumazir onganarazir kaba mɨsevegha ghaze, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven ikiam.
